page.title: 02Farming in Plympton St.Mary
page.content: There are several farms around in our area many of them go back to the original{Domesday Book. They are fairly evenly divided between{Dairy}and{Beef}and most have been in the family for years. There have been one or two changes from being just farms.Some have changed to part farm and other business activities,while others are considering expanding their{camping activities.Another has expanded his Dairy and has set up a{Farm shop. The farmers themselves have an arduous task each day which can take them up to 24hrs to complete! If any of them are ill then there is commendable cameraderie amongst them and they all set to and help the poorly farmer to keep the farm under control.
